N = int(input())
h = list(map(int,input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]




print(cnt)

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1

print(ans)
